main event: Observers reported seeing a bright, shiny silver disc-shaped object moving at a very fast speed in the sky over Sidney, Ohio, on May 3, 1949.
interesting points: The object was observed to have a wavered flight pattern, climbing and descending slightly during the observation,The sighting lasted for approximately two minutes before the object disappeared behind an obstacle,Multiple witnesses reported the object, describing it similarly as bright and shiny,The object was described to be about the size of a five-cent piece or a softball,The weather conditions were clear with no wind at the time of the sightings.
sighted object: a bright, shiny silver disc-shaped object
witness description: a jewelry store operator and a dairy deliveryman
